label: 大夫の監
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: Auditor (Gen) was a post in a provincial administration, responsible for discovering and correcting various irregularities.  The most senior incumbent could attain the fifth rank, lower grade, in which case "Commissioner" (Taifu) was added to the title.[監][大夫][RK]
